pages.text: With the forbidden texts, you have discovered a way to harness the power of the night, allowing you to create a powerful staff that bring you supremacy in necromancy.

$(l:focuses/soul_bolt_focus)Soul Bolts$() shot from this staff will turn into the more powerful Necro Bolts. Casting the $(l:focuses/illusion_focus)Mirror Spell$() while also wearing the $(l:crafts/garment/nameless_set)Nameless Set$() will cause them to shoot a single Necro Bolt at your target instead.
